import React ,{ Fragment,useState,useEffect,useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { UserProfileContext } from " ../../lib/UserProfileContext"; import "../../styles/App.css"; export const Checkout = () => { const [isValid,setValid] = useState(false) const value = useContext(UserProfileContext) const { firstName, lastName, mail, address, zipCode, city, setUserProfileContext }= value const validate = () =>{ let errors = [] const inputs = document.querySelectorAll('.form-control') inputs.forEach(input =>{ !input.value ? errors.push(input) : errors.length && errors.pop() }) setValid(!errors.length) } useEffect(() =>{ validate() }) return (

Checkout


{ setUserProfileContext({firsName:e.target.value}) }} />
{ setUserProfileContext({lastName:e.target.value}) }} />

We'll never share your email with anyone else.

Confirm
); }
